attributes.action: Ban jumps races such as the Grand National.
attributes.additional_details:
BHA figures show that, from 1994 to 2018, 4,905 horses died on British racecourses. At the annual Aintree Festival, which the Grand National is a part of, 48 horses have died since 2000. And three horses died at last month’s Cheltenham Festival. A further three horses died at this year's Aintree festival. 

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_equine_fatalities_in_the_Grand_National

https://metro.co.uk/2019/04/06/enough-is-enough-its-time-to-ban-horse-races-like-the-grand-national-9110116/

https://www.animalaid.org.uk/the-issues/our-campaigns/horse-racing/
attributes.background: It's time to end this cruel, barbaric sport which serves only to make rich people richer whilst animals are exploited.
